title: 4.5.13: unable to overwrite a file with a dot when uploading new version of this file
body:
hi,

the closed bug https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/3503 is still reproducible on a oc 4.5.13 installation.

### expected behaviour
uploading a hidden file .test via the webgui and then uploading the same file again should overwrite the existing file without an error.

### actual behaviour
uploading a hidden file .test via the webgui and then uploading the same file again doesn't overwrite the existing file. instead an message "unable to rename" is shown and the file is named .test(2).

the owncloud.log shows that the file is "not writeable" but they have the proper permissions:

     -rw-r--r-- 1 www-data www-data    24 may 27 10:26 .test
     -rw-r--r-- 1 www-data www-data    32 may 27 10:27 .test (2)

maybe connected with: https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/3310, https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/3318, https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/3152, https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2907

also note the wrong call of:

     dir=%2f&newname=.test&file=+(2).test

in my webserver log. probably this should be:

     dir=%2f&newname=.test&file=+.test (2)

instead.

### steps to reproduce
1. upload a file named .test via the upload button in the webgui
2. modify the local .test file
3. upload the same file again via the upload button in the webgui and click on "overwrite"

### server configuration
operating system: debian wheezy

web server: nginx 1.4.2

database: mysql 5.5.32

php version: 5.4.17

owncloud version: 4.5.13

### client configuration
browser: firefox 23

operating system: ubuntu

### logs
#### web server error log
xx.xx.xx.xx - - [27/may/2013:10:27:56 +0200] "get /?app=files&getfile=ajax/rename.php&dir=%2f&newname=.test&file=+(2).test http/1.1" 200 72 "https://example.com/?app=files" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; ubuntu; linux x86_64; rv:21.0) gecko/20100101 firefox/21.0"

#### php error log
[27-may-2013 08:27:56 utc] php notice:  undefined index: mime in /path/to/apps/files/ajax/mimeicon.php on line 3

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
{"app":"core","message":"unable to rename, file is not writable : files\/ (2).test","level":3,"time":1369643347}
